languages.text: {n}Сенешаль бессильно скрежещет зубами.{/n} "Однажды я пойму всю глубину и мудрость ваших решений, Лорд-капитан, а пока буду молиться, чтобы этот поступок не аукнулся вам в будущем".

{n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль бессильно скрежещет зубами.{/n} "Однажды я пойму всю глубину и мудрость ваших решений, Лорд-капитан, а пока буду молиться, чтобы этот поступок не аукнулся вам в будущем".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

{n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

{n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

{n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

{n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

languages.text: {n}El senescal aprieta los dientes, incapaz de oponerse a tu decisión.{/n} «Algún día comprenderé el significado y la sabiduría de sus decisiones, Lord Capitán, pero de momento me limitaré a rezar para que esto no le acabe pasando factura».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El senescal aprieta los dientes, incapaz de oponerse a tu decisión.{/n} «Algún día comprenderé el significado y la sabiduría de sus decisiones, Lord Capitán, pero de momento me limitaré a rezar para que esto no le acabe pasando factura».

languages.text: {n}家令長は歯を食いしばりながら、あなたの選択の前に無力さを露呈した。{/n}「いつか、あなたの決断の深さと賢明さに気づくでしょう、ロード・キャプテン、しかし、それまでの間は、この行為があなたの祟りとならないよう祈ります」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長は歯を食いしばりながら、あなたの選択の前に無力さを露呈した。{/n}「いつか、あなたの決断の深さと賢明さに気づくでしょう、ロード・キャプテン、しかし、それまでの間は、この行為があなたの祟りとならないよう祈ります」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧了牙齿，但对你的决定无能为力。{/n}“总有一天，我会意识到您的决定充满了深意与考量，舰长大人。但与此同时，我也祈祷您的决定不是在搬起石头砸自己的脚。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧了牙齿，但对你的决定无能为力。{/n}“总有一天，我会意识到您的决定充满了深意与考量，舰长大人。但与此同时，我也祈祷您的决定不是在搬起石头砸自己的脚。”

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess beißt sich angesichts deiner Entscheidung auf die Zähne.{/n} "Eines Tages, werde ich die Tiefe und Weisheit Euer Entscheidungen gewiss erkennen, Lord Captain, aber bis dahin bete ich, dass Euch diese hier nicht irgendwann einholt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess beißt sich angesichts deiner Entscheidung auf die Zähne.{/n} "Eines Tages, werde ich die Tiefe und Weisheit Euer Entscheidungen gewiss erkennen, Lord Captain, aber bis dahin bete ich, dass Euch diese hier nicht irgendwann einholt."

languages.text: {n}Témoin impuissant de votre décision, le sénéchal serre les dents.{/n} « Un jour, je comprendrai toute la portée et la sagesse de vos choix, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais en attendant, je vais prier pour que ce parti pris ne revienne pas vous hanter. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Témoin impuissant de votre décision, le sénéchal serre les dents.{/n} « Un jour, je comprendrai toute la portée et la sagesse de vos choix, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais en attendant, je vais prier pour que ce parti pris ne revienne pas vous hanter. »

languages.text: {n}Seneşal dişlerini gıcırdatıyor. Seçimin karşısında kendine zor hâkim oluyor.{/n} "Bir gün kararlarınızın derinliği ile bilgeliğini kavrayacağım Lord Kaptan ancak o zamana dek bu eylemin dönüp dolaşıp yine sizi bulmaması için dua edeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal grits his teeth, impotent in the face of your choice.{/n} "One day I will realise the depth and wisdom of your decisions, Lord Captain, but, in the meantime, I will pray that this act does not come back to haunt you."
